title: Tim Owens Jazz and Broadcast Collection Digitized by Grammy Museum Grant
description: Article URL: https://library.unt.edu/news/2025/06-06-tim-owens-collection/ Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=44242757 Points: 5 # Comments: 0

excerpt: Thanks to a generous grant by The Recording Academy’s GRAMMY Museum Grants Program, the UNT Music Library is proud to debut a wealth of jazz history through ...
text: notice Some items are only available on campus or will require authentication via EUID and Password at the point of use. Posted: 06/06/2025 Thanks to a generous grant by The Recording Academy’s GRAMMY Museum Grants Program, the UNT Music Library is proud to debut a wealth of jazz history through the Tim Owens Jazz and Broadcast Collection. This newly digitized collection showcases over 150 hours of interviews and performance masters recorded for National Public Radio’s jazz programs and includes interviews by Owens from the Peabody Award-winning series Jazz Profiles. With this new content, UNT continues to be a part of the global movement to progress music research and preservation.
html:
Some items are only available on campus or will require authentication via EUID and Password at the point of use.

Thanks to a generous grant by The Recording Academy’s GRAMMY Museum Grants Program, the UNT Music Library is proud to debut a wealth of jazz history through the Tim Owens Jazz and Broadcast Collection. This newly digitized collection showcases over 150 hours of interviews and performance masters recorded for National Public Radio’s jazz programs and includes interviews by Owens from the Peabody Award-winning series Jazz Profiles. With this new content, UNT continues to be a part of the global movement to progress music research and preservation.
